name: GitGud Aiming
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

Right click to aim / Cancel Building mode ( you cant shoot if you arent aiming )

Left click to shoot ( impact particles in development )

Default Controls ( Can be changed in menu )

"+" / "-" to change mouse sensivity

R to restart the map

F1 to build walls

F2 to build Floors

F3 to build Stairs

game in development.

for now there are 2 minigames, one for muscle reflex and another for aim tracking.

things to add:

- duck hunt game (in development) - wild Gunnman - coop mode - 

donations will be used to buy better models, animations, etc, and licenses for steam.

the names of the donors will be in the credits.
